articles.author: Emily Craig
articles.title: Belgium and Austria's Covid outbreaks overtake UK despite having restrictions such as face masks - Daily Mail
articles.description: Daily testing data from Our World in Data shows the UK dropped to the fourth most-infectious country in Western Europe, after holding the top spot for four months.
articles.content:
Britain's Covid outbreak is no longer the worst in Western Europe, according to official data that shows infections are beginning to soar across the continent.

articles.title: WHO: Europe is again at epicenter of pandemic - Axios
articles.description: "We are at another critical point of pandemic resurgence," WHO European director Hans Kluge warned.

articles.author: Dominica Funnell
articles.title: Europe ‘once again’ the epicentre of COVID-19 pandemic - Sky News Australia
articles.description: The World Health Organisation has urged European countries to work harder to stem the spread of the coronavirus as the Delta variant takes hold of the continent bringing with it an alarming rise in transmission and deaths.
articles.content: Europe is "once again" the epicentre of the COVID-19 pandemic as the World Health Organisation warns new infections and deaths are of "grave concern" as the Delta variant spreads across the continent… [+3688 chars]
